modal: I was asked by Emdad at 3DUX to develop a responsive website and integrate it into a Wordpress theme with a database so he was able to create content for his portfolio of work. The content of his portfolio needed to be hidden behind a user system so that only people with granted privileges could access the confidential portfolio information.
